title: Welcome To My Blog
text:
This is the first post in a Quarto blog. Welcome!

Since this post doesnâ€™t specify an explicit image, the first image in the post will be used in the listing page of posts.

title: Greenâ€™s Theorem
text:
Greenâ€™s Theorem relates a line integral around a simple closed curve C to a double integral over the plane region D bounded by C:
\[
\oint_C (P \, dx + Q \, dy) = \iint_D \left( \frac{\\partial Q}{\\partial x} - \frac{\\partial P}{\\partial y} \\right) dx \, dy
\]
It has applications in linear algebra, electromagnetism, and fluid dynamics.
